hero.tagline: Driving Success Through People and Innovation

about.intro: Driving Success Through People and Innovation
about.bioParagraph1: I'm a dynamic marketing professional with diverse experience across digital marketing, content creation, and brand management. Currently pursuing my Bachelor of Business Administration with a 3.68 GPA while gaining hands-on expertise with global brands like L'Oréal and Estée Lauder, where I consistently exceeded KPIs by 100-130%.
about.bioParagraph2: From co-founding Drunky 3D Studio to managing international collaborations in Japan, I thrive at the intersection of creativity and strategy. I'm passionate about building meaningful connections between brands and audiences through innovative digital marketing solutions.

educationHistory.institutionName: University of Economics and Finance Ho Chi Minh City

projects.projectDescription: Improved team productivity by 40% through process optimization
Successfully managed 5 concurrent projects across departments
Implemented new workflow reducing delivery time by 30%

responsibilities: Supported digital marketing campaigns and assisted in online brand activations for L'Oréal's Professional Products Division.
Coordinated with cross-functional teams to optimize social media presence and campaign performance.
Hosted daily livestream sessions showcasing Estée Lauder's products through OBS Studio, consistently achieved 100–130% of monthly KPIs
Collaborated with the Ecommerce and Marketing team to align livestream content with seasonal campaigns, holiday promotions, and new product launches
Streamlined dishwashing workflows by reorganizing kitchen stations
Collaborated with the housekeeping team to prioritize room cleaning schedules during peak occupancy periods
Introduced, guide, answer, respond to customers through livestream
Participated in content creation: Coordinate with Brand team to set content orientation
Recorded videos to prepare for Livestream sessions/Videos for sales
Coordinated with team to achieve the highest KPI: November (125%), December (120%)
Content Creation: Created marketing plan and weekly TikTok content (+9k followers)
KOL Management: Managed campaigns with prominent KOLs like Giang Ơi, Gia Đình Hanna, Kimberly
B2B Sales: Built B2B pool of 80-100 potential customers, managed relationships with major chains
Livestreaming: Achieved 100% of monthly KPIs through TikTok and Shopee livestreams
Oriented long-term and short-term strategies, implemented new ideas to increase brand awareness
Created communication and marketing plans, resulting in 500+ student registrations for 3 main courses
Managed and coordinated team members effectively

skillList.skillDescription: Strong ability to lead teams, foster collaboration, and achieve collective goals through effective team management
Analytical approach to challenges, developing innovative solutions and implementing effective strategies
Excellence in verbal and written communication, with strong presentation and interpersonal skills
Flexible approach to changing situations, quick to learn and embrace new methodologies
Innovative approach to challenges, thinking outside the box to develop unique solutions
Skilled in planning, executing, and delivering projects on time and within scope

activityAccomplishments: Supported the organizers to engage the students in HCMC to the conference
Contributed to attracting the participants which led to increase to 1000+ participants

accomplishments: Certificate of Outstanding contribution to UEF's extracurricular activities 2021-2024
Project Design UEF - Excellent Innovation Project 2023
